alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 10 at 3:24AM EDT until May 10 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Atlantic Coastal Cape May, Coastal Atlantic and Coastal Ocean. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Coastal Ocean
